headline.main: LATIN TRADE CHANCES BRIGHT, MOORE FINDS; President of Line, Back After Visit, Sees Big Opportunity

docs.snippet: Increased purchases by the United States in Argentina and Uruguay have had little effect in easing the discriminatory exchange treatment by which both nations discourage imports from this country, exporters complained yesterday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Increased purchases by the United States in Argentina and Uruguay have had little effect in easing the discriminatory exchange treatment by which both nations discourage imports from this country, exporters complained yesterday.
docs.abstract: U S exporter rejects half sterling-half dollar payment offer; others favor dollar payments

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, April 5--Arbitration of the expropriation of American oil properties by Mexico has been formally requested in a note delivered to Dr. Francisco Castillo Najera, the Mexican Ambassador, by Secretary of State Cordell Hull.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, April 5--Arbitration of the expropriation of American oil properties by Mexico has been formally requested in a note delivered to Dr. Francisco Castillo Najera, the Mexican Ambassador, by Secretary of State Cordell Hull.
docs.abstract: N Thomas ready to run as Socialist candidate

headline.main: HULL BIDS MEXICO ARBITRATE ON OIL; Little Chance Is Seen That Cardenas Will Alter Stand That Issue Is Domestic

byline.original: By BERTRAM D. HULEN Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: LONDON, April 5--For the second time since the war began bombers of the Royal Air Force penetrated the strong defenses of Wilhelmshaven yesterday and bombed five German warships.
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, April 5--For the second time since the war began bombers of the Royal Air Force penetrated the strong defenses of Wilhelmshaven yesterday and bombed five German warships.
